responses.rationale: States a fact about rarity but lacks explicit calming language.
Reports facts (absence of US cases, worldwide cases/deaths) without explicit calming language.
Reports negative facts (deaths) without explicit calming language.
Reports an action (culling) without explicit calming language.
Reports a control measure without explicit calming language.
Reports confirmation of the virus and deaths without explicit calming language.
Provides advice/instructions without explicit calming language.
'risk of humans contracting bird flu is very low' is an intensified low-risk evaluation.
'does not present a food safety risk' is a bare negation, not an explicit calming cue per Q5 rules.
Reports facts about the virus strain and past impacts without explicit calming language.
